name: The Randomless Mission
description:
Who said that dice in space are risky? Surely not in The Randomless Mission!

Use your ships wisely and you'll be able to mitigate the luck of your dice rolls in this little, original puzzle game. Why taking a gamble when you can avoid it completely?

This game has been made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - theme: roll of the dice.
